channel.title: QUICK- Help
channel.description:
As of now, my uncles Acer has been unexpectedly shut down every time I boot it. This has happened right after I was trying to install XP w/ Sata Drive, but the Acer didn't have a Sata Drive. If I try to install the regular XP on it, it shuts down still right after loading the files. If I try to use it's back-up CDs, it still shuts down. No matter what I do, it will shut down.
How do I fix this?
DO NOT SAY SWITCH TO LINUX.

item.title: QUICK- Help
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Press F6 as the Setup is loading.

Read full topic

item.title: QUICK- Help
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

try to unplug everything and plugging it back in. I had that same problem and that worked for me then i could reinstall the xp/w sata drive

Read full topic

item.title: QUICK- Help
